001package squidpony;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.util.HashSet;
009
010/**
011 * An experimental variant on LZSEncoding to encode byte arrays to compressed Strings, and decode them back. This always
012 * uses UTF-16-safe encoding, which means it does not use half of all possible chars in the compressed Strings but makes
013 * sure the Strings are valid UTF-16 (so they can be written to and read from file more safely).
014 * <br>
015 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 1/11/2020.
016 */
017@Beta
018public final class ByteStringEncoding {
019    private ByteStringEncoding(){}
020
021    private static String compress(byte[] uncompressed) {
022        if (uncompressed == null) return null;
023        if (uncompressed.length == 0) return "";
024        final int bitsPerChar = 15, offset = 32;
025        int i, value;
026        HashMap<String, Integer> context_dictionary = new HashMap<>();
027        HashSet<String> context_dictionaryToCreate = new HashSet<>();
028        String context_c;
029        String context_wc;
030        String context_w = "";
031        int context_enlargeIn = 2; // Compensate for the first entry which should not count
032        int context_dictSize = 3;
033        int context_numBits = 2;
034        StringBuilder context_data = new StringBuilder(uncompressed.length >>> 1);
035        int context_data_val = 0;
036        int context_data_position = 0;
037        int ii;
038
039        for (ii = 0; ii < uncompressed.length; ii++) {
040            context_c = new String(uncompressed, ii, 1, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
041            if (!context_dictionary.containsKey(context_c)) {
042                context_dictionary.put(context_c, context_dictSize++);
043                context_dictionaryToCreate.add(context_c);
044            }
045
046            context_wc = context_w + context_c;
047            if (context_dictionary.containsKey(context_wc)) {
048                context_w = context_wc;
049            } else {
050                if (context_dictionaryToCreate.contains(context_w)) {
051                    value = (context_w.charAt(0) & 255);
052                    for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
053                        context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1);
054                        if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
055                            context_data_position = 0;
056                            context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
057                            context_data_val = 0;
058                        } else {
059                            context_data_position++;
060                        }
061                    }
062                    for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
063                        context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
064                        if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
065                            context_data_position = 0;
066                            context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
067                            context_data_val = 0;
068                        } else {
069                            context_data_position++;
070                        }
071                        value >>= 1;
072                    }
073                    context_enlargeIn--;
074                    if (context_enlargeIn == 0) {
075                        context_enlargeIn = 1 << context_numBits++;
076                    }
077                    context_dictionaryToCreate.remove(context_w);
078                } else {
079                    value = context_dictionary.get(context_w);
080                    for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
081                        context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
082                        if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
083                            context_data_position = 0;
084                            context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
085                            context_data_val = 0;
086                        } else {
087                            context_data_position++;
088                        }
089                        value >>= 1;
090                    }
091
092                }
093                context_enlargeIn--;
094                if (context_enlargeIn == 0) {
095                    context_enlargeIn = 1 << context_numBits++;
096                }
097                // Add wc to the dictionary.
098                context_dictionary.put(context_wc, context_dictSize++);
099                context_w = context_c;
100            }
101        }
102
103        // Output the code for w.
104        if (!context_w.isEmpty()) {
105            if (context_dictionaryToCreate.contains(context_w)) {
106//                if (context_w.charAt(0) < 256) {
107                for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
108                    context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1);
109                    if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
110                        context_data_position = 0;
111                        context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
112                        context_data_val = 0;
113                    } else {
114                        context_data_position++;
115                    }
116                }
117                value = context_w.charAt(0);
118                for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
119                    context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
120                    if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
121                        context_data_position = 0;
122                        context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
123                        context_data_val = 0;
124                    } else {
125                        context_data_position++;
126                    }
127                    value >>= 1;
128                }
129//                } else {
130//                    value = 1;
131//                    for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
132//                        context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | value;
133//                        if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
134//                            context_data_position = 0;
135//                            context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
136//                            context_data_val = 0;
137//                        } else {
138//                            context_data_position++;
139//                        }
140//                        value = 0;
141//                    }
142//                    value = context_w.charAt(0);
143//                    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
144//                        context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
145//                        if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
146//                            context_data_position = 0;
147//                            context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
148//                            context_data_val = 0;
149//                        } else {
150//                            context_data_position++;
151//                        }
152//                        value >>= 1;
153//                    }
154//                }
155
156                context_dictionaryToCreate.remove(context_w);
157            } else {
158                value = context_dictionary.get(context_w);
159                for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
160                    context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
161                    if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
162                        context_data_position = 0;
163                        context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
164                        context_data_val = 0;
165                    } else {
166                        context_data_position++;
167                    }
168                    value >>= 1;
169                }
170
171            }
172        }
173
174        // Mark the end of the stream
175        value = 2;
176        for (i = 0; i < context_numBits; i++) {
177            context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1) | (value & 1);
178            if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
179                context_data_position = 0;
180                context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
181                context_data_val = 0;
182            } else {
183                context_data_position++;
184            }
185            value >>= 1;
186        }
187
188        // Flush the last char
189        while (true) {
190            context_data_val = (context_data_val << 1);
191            if (context_data_position == bitsPerChar - 1) {
192                context_data.append((char) (context_data_val + offset));
193                break;
194            } else
195                context_data_position++;
196        }
197        context_data.append(' ');
198        return context_data.toString();
199    }
200
201    private static byte[] decompress(String compressed) {
202        if (compressed == null)
203            return null;
204        if (compressed.isEmpty())
205            return new byte[0];
206        final char[] getNextValue = compressed.toCharArray();
207        final int length = getNextValue.length, resetValue = 16384, offset = -32;
208        ArrayList<String> dictionary = new ArrayList<>();
209        int enlargeIn = 4, dictSize = 4, numBits = 3, position = resetValue, index = 1, resb, maxpower, power,
210                resultLength = 0;
211        String entry, w, c;
212        ArrayList<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
213        char bits, val = (char) (getNextValue[0] + offset);
214
215        for (char i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
216            dictionary.add(i, String.valueOf(i));
217        }
218
219        bits = 0;
220        maxpower = 2;
221        power = 0;
222        while (power != maxpower) {
223            resb = val & position;
224            position >>= 1;
225            if (position == 0) {
226                position = resetValue;
227                val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
228            }
229            bits |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
230        }
231
232        switch (bits) {
233            case 0:
234                bits = 0;
235                maxpower = 8;
236                power = 0;
237                while (power != maxpower) {
238                    resb = val & position;
239                    position >>= 1;
240                    if (position == 0) {
241                        position = resetValue;
242                        val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
243                    }
244                    bits |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
245                }
246                c = String.valueOf(bits);
247                break;
248            case 1:
249                bits = 0;
250                maxpower = 16;
251                power = 0;
252                while (power != maxpower) {
253                    resb = val & position;
254                    position >>= 1;
255                    if (position == 0) {
256                        position = resetValue;
257                        val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
258                    }
259                    bits |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
260                }
261                c = String.valueOf(bits);
262                break;
263            default:
264                return new byte[0];
265        }
266        dictionary.add(c);
267        w = c;
268        result.add(w);
269        resultLength += w.length();
270        while (true) {
271            if (index > length) {
272                return new byte[0];
273            }
274            int cc = 0;
275            maxpower = numBits;
276            power = 0;
277            while (power != maxpower) {
278                resb = val & position;
279                position >>= 1;
280                if (position == 0) {
281                    position = resetValue;
282                    val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
283                }
284                cc |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
285            }
286            switch (cc) {
287                case 0:
288                    bits = 0;
289                    maxpower = 8;
290                    power = 0;
291                    while (power != maxpower) {
292                        resb = val & position;
293                        position >>= 1;
294                        if (position == 0) {
295                            position = resetValue;
296                            val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
297                        }
298                        bits |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
299                    }
300
301                    dictionary.add(String.valueOf(bits));
302                    cc = dictSize++;
303                    enlargeIn--;
304                    break;
305                case 1:
306                    bits = 0;
307                    maxpower = 16;
308                    power = 0;
309                    while (power != maxpower) {
310                        resb = val & position;
311                        position >>= 1;
312                        if (position == 0) {
313                            position = resetValue;
314                            val = (char) (getNextValue[index++] + offset);
315                        }
316                        bits |= (resb > 0 ? 1 : 0) << power++;
317                    }
318                    dictionary.add(String.valueOf(bits));
319                    cc = dictSize++;
320                    enlargeIn--;
321                    break;
322                case 2:
323//                    byte[] bytes = new byte[resultLength];
324//                    String r;
325//                    for (int i = 0, p = 0, n = result.size(); i < n; i++) {
326//                        r = result.get(i);
327//                        System.arraycopy(r.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1), 0, bytes, p, r.length());
328//                        p += r.length();
329//                    }
330//                    return bytes;
331                    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(resultLength);
332                    for (int i = 0, n = result.size(); i < n; i++) {
333                        sb.append(result.get(i));
334                    }
335                    return sb.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
336            }
337
338            if (enlargeIn == 0) {
339                enlargeIn = 1 << numBits;
340                numBits++;
341            }
342
343            if (cc < dictionary.size() && dictionary.get(cc) != null) {
344                entry = dictionary.get(cc);
345            } else {
346                if (cc == dictSize) {
347                    entry = w + w.charAt(0);
348                } else {
349                    return new byte[0];
350                }
351            }
352            result.add(entry);
353            resultLength += entry.length();
354
355            // Add w+entry[0] to the dictionary.
356            dictionary.add(w + entry.charAt(0));
357            dictSize++;
358            enlargeIn--;
359
360            w = entry;
361
362            if (enlargeIn == 0) {
363                enlargeIn = 1 << numBits;
364                numBits++;
365            }
366
367        }
368
369    }
370
371}
